title: Amends the state finance law to repeal changes made in part KK of chapter 56 of the laws of 2009, relating to the video lottery gaming facilities aid formula
summary: Repeals changes made in part KK of chapter 56 of the laws of 2009, relating to the video lottery gaming facilities aid formula.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the video lottery gaming facilities aid formula
